item.name: promotion.promotions
item.param: pagination, pagination\.pageSize, pagination\.pageCount, pagination\.currentPage, pagination\.count, promotions\[\d+\]\.id, promotions\[\d+\]\.merchant\.headForWeb, promotions\[\d+\]\.merchant\.shortName, promotions\[\d+\]\.title, promotions\[\d+\]\.validEndDate, promotions\[\d+\]\.maxSendCount, promotions\[\d+\]\.sentCount, promotions\[\d+\]\.content
